Columbus n 1: the state capital of Ohio; located in the center of the state; site of Ohio State University [syn: {capital of Ohio}] 2: Italian navigator who discovered the New World in the service of Spain while looking for a route to China (1451-1506) [syn: {Christopher Columbus}, {Cristoforo Colombo}, {Cristobal Colon}] 3: a town in eastern Mississippi near the border with Alabama 4: a city in western Georgia on the Chattahoochee River; industrial center
